title: France panorama. [No. 70/13]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Mr Pompidou visits the new UNESCO installations. The turbo-train goes into service. 2. Metros galore - the Paris Metro on the export market. 3. March summer - the Guyana Space Center and the launching of the German “Dial” satellite with a French Diamond B booster. 4. Canada in Paris - the “from Raphael to Picasso”, a Canadian exhibition in Paris.
